Description: Painted sycomore fig(?) wood reis shabti of Tawert with a black wig with ringlets on the lappets, a brown face with the eyes traced in black, a red, blue and yellow collar, crossed arms in low relief with red hands, the body is represented wearing a short-sleeved white tunic with a triangular apron inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
